Dear user, this update introduces Auto-update in Game for Peace and Honor of Kings. Favorites Space includes display settings for favorited images. Additionally, this release improves the system stability and performance. It also incorporates a security patch. Update to enjoy the new features and improvements
• Game for Peace and Honor of Kings now include Auto-update feature. During charging at night, if connected to Wi-Fi, game updates will automatically start

• Favorites Space now includes display settings for favorited images. You can select Show in both Gallery and Favorites Space or Show in Favorites Space only, based on your needs. Try it out by going to: Favorites Space > Storage/display settings > Favorited images
• You can access mini-games via their icons on the home screen

• Android security patch (Oct 2025) has been incorporated for system security. For more information about Honor Security updates, please visit our website https://www.honor.com/global/support/bulletin/2025/10
